ISSUE.TITLE: Inventory host add form doesn't save
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ##### ISSUE TYPE - Bug Report ##### SUMMARY Inventory Host Add form does not save because it thinks the inventory lookup field is required ![bug](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/15881645/75999126-cb48ab80-5ecf-11ea-9540-544c8c682086.gif) ##### STEPS TO REPRODUCE * Fill out an Inventory Host Add form * Save ##### EXPECTED RESULTS * Form saves and navigates to detail view ##### ACTUAL RESULTS * Form does not save, no navigation, no errors shown

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #6159 from ansible/hostname-validation-regression-4.3 [backport 4.3] Add back in the uniqueness validation on Instance.hostname

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Fix traceback on timeout with slicing + facts (#13139) (#6184) Slicing a QS with a step parameter forces the QS and returns a list. Signed-off-by: Rick Elrod <rick@elrod.me>
